resources.string: Create an account to connect with friends, family and communities of people who share your interests.
Enter the name you use in real life
Choose your date of birth.You can always make this private later.Why do I need to provide my birthday?
You can change who sees your gender on your profile later.
Enter the mobile number where you can be\n contacted.No one will see this on your profile.
You may receive WhatsApp and SMS notifications from us.\nLearn more
Create a password with at least 6 letters or numbers.It should be something others can\'t guess.
We\'ll save the login information for {name}, so you won\'t need to enter it next time you log in.
Agree to Gossips\'s terms and policies

People who use our services may have uploaded your contact information to Gossips.Learn more

By tapping I agree, you agree to create an account and to Gossip's Terms, Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy.

The Privacy Policy describes the ways we can use the information we collect when you create an account.For example, we use this information to provide, personalize and improve our products, including ads.
